record.title: ORDERS FOR FRIDAY, DECEMBER 7, 2007
record.narrative:
ORDERS FOR FRIDAY, DECEMBER 7, 2007 -- (Senate - December 06, 2007)

[Page: S15000]

speaking.paragraph: I ask unanimous consent that when the Senate completes its business today, it stand adjourned until 9 a.m., Friday, December 7; that on tomorrow, following the prayer and pledge, the Journal of proceedings be approved to date, the morning hour deemed expired, the time for the two leaders reserved for their use later in the day, and the Senate then proceed to the House message on H.R. 6, as under a previous order.

record.chair: Without objection, it is so ordered.
